thread.title: Venezuela's troops are growing disillusioned with Maduro

title: Venezuela's troops are growing disillusioned with Maduro
text:
Venezuela's troops are growing disillusioned with Maduro 3:54pm EDT - 02:18
Three hundred thousand soldiers and police will be at polling stations for Venezuela's presidential vote on Sunday, but many of the largely young troops are tired of President Maduro's rule and are plotting their resignation and migration ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Three hundred thousand soldiers and police will be at polling stations for Venezuela's presidential vote on Sunday, but many of the largely young troops are tired of President Maduro's rule and are plotting their resignation and migration Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2IsPKPT
